lines.text: Action, he says. Action he shall get.

[after Bugs has dropped a tank on him]
I'm feelin' mighty low.
Well, Toodles, do I get my home back, or do I have to get tough?
[Last line, after the skyscraper is built around Bugs' hole]
After all, a man's home is his castle.
Oh, brother, what a night. Me head's still spinning.
Of course. I'll tuck you back into your bed.
